block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$2.4 million 24 Gramercy Park South 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,600-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, Gramercy Park view; maintenance $2,950, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $2.2 million (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Ashforth Warburg)

$1,277,500 684 Broadway (Third Street) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; home office, 8 windows, 10-ft. ceilings, maple floors, maintenance $1,491, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $1.295 million, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$540,000 167 East 61st Street 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, 9-ft. ceilings, balcony, 2 exposures; maintenance $3,020, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $550,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$400,000 130 West 79th Street (Austin) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. condominium in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, 2 balconies, 2 exposures, health club; common charges $496; taxes $3,480; listed at $400,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$849,000 885 West End Avenue (103rd Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen, maid's room, dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen, decorative fireplace, parquet floors, oversized windows, 3 exposures, washer/dryer; maintenance $1,119, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $849,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$205,000 2438 Corlear Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 55-year-old town house; dining room, skylight, finished basement, rear deck, 1-car garage, 16-by-104-ft. lot; taxes $1,650; listed at $220,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Trebach Realty)

$130,000 3671 Hudson Manor Terrace (Manor Terrace) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, c/a, high floor, Hudson River view, pool and health club in building; maintenance $646, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $130,000, 1 week on market (Broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$180,000 3615 Shore Road 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; new eat-in kitchen and bath, harbor view; maintenance $769, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $179,000 (multiple bids), 8 weeks on market (Broker: Velsor Realty)

$367,000 50 Plaza Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doorman, parquet floors, original moldings and detail; maintenance $1,055, 58% tax-deductible; listed at $389,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$316,000 17 Reeve Place 2-family attached prewar house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, oak floors in each unit; rear deck, 15-by-104-ft. lot; taxes $750; listed at $330,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Joseph Berman Real Estate)

$315,000 89-02 69th Avenue 2-family 75-year-old frame house; in primary unit, 2 bedrooms, dining area; 1 bedroom, eat-in kitchen in other; 1 bath in each; finished basement, 2-car garage, 23-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,008; listed at $335,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Dix Realty)

$300,000 144-14 22nd Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old brick and vinyl-sided house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, new driveway, 42-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,760; listed at $305,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$180,000 726 Jewitt Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 100-year-old colonial; dining room, sun room, h/w floors, 50-by-118-ft. lot; taxes $1,468; listed at $203,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Salmon Real Estate)

$320,000 439 Bayview Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, fireplace, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,900; listed at $325,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman)
$215,000 56 Kingfisher Road 6-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $7,100; listed at $229,000, 20 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate Realty)

$352,000 90 Elderwood Drive 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 11-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, fireplace, porch, 1-car attached garage, 0.92-acre lot; taxes $9,300; listed at $379,000, 28 weeks on market (Brokers: Coach; Henrietta Homes)

$450,000 158 Schenck Avenue 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 63-year-old Dutch colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sun porch, 1-car garage, 70-by-127-ft. lot; taxes $4,800; listed at $499,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Great Neck Realty Better Homes and Gardens; Lurie)
$115,000 48 Broadway 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old Victorian; w/w carpeting, full basement, attic, 21-by-169-ft. lot; taxes $4,412; listed at $124,900, 1 week on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$415,000 39 West Shore Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old colonial; basement, fireplace, c/a, 2-car garage, family room, 1.38-acre lot; taxes $10,517; listed at $419,900, 18 weeks on market (Brokers: Weidel Realtors; N. T. Callaway)

$375,000 611 Bartell Place 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 45-year-old colonial, 2-car garage, finished basement, c/a, family room, deck, 0.39-acre lot; taxes $6,701; listed at $385,000, 19 weeks on market (Brokers: Century 21 Mainstream; Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens)

$187,000 1 East Hayestown Road (Barclay Commons) 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,625-sq.-ft. condo in an 8-year-old building; dining room, whirlpool bath, 1-car garage, pool in complex; common charges $191; taxes $3,273; listed at $191,900, 22 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$500,000 24 Spring Street (Burberry Mews) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,641-sq.-ft. condo in an 8-year-old building; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, c/a, 1-car garage; common charges $131; taxes $5,441; listed at $535,000, 27 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$197,900 18 Sunflower Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 48-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, c/a, 1-car garage, 0.17-acre lot; taxes $3,439; listed at $199,900, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$267,000 198 Manhattan Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 100-year-old Victorian; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, modern kitchen, unfinished basement; 0.11-acre lot; taxes $4,962; listed at $285,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21 Wolff)

$975,000 21 Langdon Avenue 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 73-year-old colonial; center hall, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, powder room, terrace, attached 2-car garage; 0.45-acre lot; taxes $21,019; listed at $939,000 (multiple bids), 12 weeks on market (Broker: Houihan/Lawrence)

$210,000 430 Homestead Avenue 6-bedroom, 2-bath, 75-year-old colonial; veranda, fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, oak woodwork, yard, unfinished basement; 40-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $4,137; listed at $220,000, 19 weeks on market (Brokers: ERA Exactly; Prudential Ragette)

$175,000 222 Martling Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 36-year-old co-op; foyer, dining room, hardwood floors, balcony; maintenance $700; 45% tax-deductible; listed at $190,000, 13 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; DeCecchis)
Correction: June 18, 2000, Sunday A listing in the Residential Sales column last Sunday for a Bay Ridge co-op that sold for $180,000 misstated the address. It is 9615 Shore Road, not 3615.
A listing in the Residential Sales column last Sunday for a Bay Ridge co-op that sold for $180,000 misstated the address. It is 9615 Shore Road, not 3615.
